get.description:
• This method will be used to get the status of the submitted entities for a given batch by supplying the batch id

Business Rules:
  1. If Batch ID supplied does not exists in our system, API will return �HTTP 404 - Not Found� status code

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: This parameter represents the Authorization token obtained from the OKTA Authorization server. It is the Bearer token provided to authorize the consumer. Usage Authorization : Bearer token

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: This parameter represents the API Key provided for the consumption of this resource. It is provided as the client_id when creating an associated App

parameters.name: batchId
parameters.description: Format - int32. This parameter represents the Batch ID

BatchResult.description: This class represents the Batch Result

entityType.description: This attribute represents the type of Entity. Entity can be of either Staff, Listing or Transaction

status.description: This attribute represents the status of the batch

successEntities.description: This attribute represents the successfully submitted entities.

failureEntities.description: This attribute represents the entities that are failed.

FailureEntity.description: This Class represents the Failure Entities

entityGuid.description: This attribute represents the GUID information of the entity

providerIdentifier.description: This attribute represents the identifier used to represent the respective entity.

errorMessages.description: This attribute represents the failure text information of the failed entities

SuccessEntity.description: This Class represents theSuccess Entity class

entityGuid.description: This attribute represents the GUID information of the respective entity.

providerIdentifier.description: This attribute represents the identifier used to represent the respective entity.
